results.text: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes the supernatural peace that God provides, which surpasses human understanding.
results.reflection: Embrace God's peace to protect your heart and mind amidst life's challenges.

results.text: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
results.reason: Jesus promises His followers a unique peace that is unlike anything the world offers.
results.reflection: Trust in the peace that Jesus freely offers, and let it calm your fears.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: This verse highlights the connection between trusting God and experiencing perfect peace.
results.reflection: Focus your thoughts on God and trust Him for enduring peace.

results.text: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.
results.reason: Believers are called to let Christ's peace govern their hearts, fostering unity and gratitude.
results.reflection: Allow Christ’s peace to govern your heart and cultivate a spirit of thankfulness.

results.text: The LORD gives strength to his people; the LORD blesses his people with peace.
results.reason: God is depicted as the source of strength and peace for His people.
results.reflection: Rely on God’s strength and receive His blessing of peace in your life.
